The 666 Number has not been certified by Price Waterhouse and is probably incorrect, but the first Ritter buyer will be given 667, so he need not worry.
I dreamt last night that someone would offer to buy a Ritter today.

In KC they called him Lou Ritter
Who was fond of his baby sitter
One day he spied her twerking
Which caused him to start jerking
Before his epileptic fitter.

Buy now before the next bump.
They're not going to get better.;):eek:
